abstract: Airbnb-aligned design system engineering for SwiftUI iOS 17+ apps. Contains 50 rules across 8 categories: Token Architecture (CRITICAL), Color System Engineering (CRITICAL), Typography Scale (HIGH), Spacing & Sizing (HIGH), Component Style Library (CRITICAL), Asset Management (MEDIUM-HIGH), Theme & Brand Infrastructure (MEDIUM), and Consistency & Governance (HIGH). Mandates @Equatable on every view, @Observable state, DLS-style protocols for component styling, and automated governance via SwiftLint and SPM package boundaries, aligned with modular MVVM-C feature boundaries.
